Package io.github.jornegitgud.galaxyquest.sprites

Class DirectionalSpriteList

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jornegitgud.galaxyquest.sprites.DirectionalSpriteList
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SpriteList
    public class DirectionalSpriteList
extends java.lang.Object
implements SpriteList
    the DirectionalSpriteList creates 4(directions) Arraylists that hold sprites used to in animations
